attributes.action: Build the British Naval Typhoon jets instead of the USA's F-35C for our QE class aircraft carriers!
attributes.additional_details: Americas F-35 fighter jets that Great Britain has ordered for our two new QE class aircraft carriers have been delayed and fraught with technical problems. The latest of these problems is that these aircraft "Cannot land on aircraft carriers". Great Britain should cancel the order for the F-35's and build the British Naval Typhoon fighter jet. This will give GB the strike capability before 2020 and secure British jobs!
